mapper.select: select w.id, w.name, w.pinyin, w.gender, w.certificate_no, w.birthday, w.native_place, w.work_date, w.entry_date, w.engage_date, w.first_degree, w.first_graduate_school, w.first_graduate_date, w.highest_degree, w.highest_graduate_school, w.highest_graduate_date, w.worker_category, w.post_category, w.politics, w.tel_phone, w.mobile_phone, w.address, w.post_code, w.email, w.wx, w.qq, w.status, w.position_grade, w.online, w.recommend, w.org_user_id, w.wx_cp_user_id, d.id dept_id, d.name dept_name, dw.id dept_workerid, dw.status stop_status, o.id org_id, o.name org_name from sys_worker w, sys_dept_worker dw, sys_dept d, sys_org o where w.id = dw.worker_id and dw.dept_id = d.id and o.id = d.org_id and w.mobile_phone = #{phone} order by dw.status desc limit 0,1

select w.id, w.type, w.nation, w.name, w.pinyin, w.gender, w.certificate_no, w.birthday, w.native_place, w.work_date, w.entry_date, w.engage_date, w.first_degree, w.first_graduate_school, w.first_graduate_date, w.highest_degree, w.highest_graduate_school, w.highest_graduate_date, w.worker_category, w.post_category, w.politics, w.certificate_address, w.tel_phone, w.mobile_phone, w.address, w.post_code, w.email, w.positional, w.post, w.intro, w.wx, w.qq, w.status, w.online, w.pic, w.recommend, w.auth_status, w.auth_date, w.qualified_status, w.qualified_date, w.org_user_id, w.org_user_pwd, w.wx_cp_user_id, w.position_grade, d.id dept_id, d.name dept_name, d.org_dept_id, d.qywx_dept_id, d.his_dept_id, w.wx_cp_user_id, dw.id dept_workerid, dw.status stop_status, o.id org_id, o.name org_name, o.his_id org_his_id from sys_worker w, sys_dept_worker dw, sys_dept d, sys_org o where w.id = dw.worker_id and dw.dept_id = d.id and o.id = d.org_id and dw.status = 'a' and w.id = #{id}

select id, parent_id, name, 'dept' type, qywx_order seq from sys_dept where org_id = #{orgId} union select a.id, c.id as parent_id, a.name, 'worker' type, 0 seq from sys_worker a, sys_dept_worker b, sys_dept c, sys_org d where a.id = b.worker_id and b.status = 'a' and b.dept_id = c.id and c.org_id = d.id and d.id = #{orgId} and a.type = #{type} and a.positional = #{positional} and a.post = #{post} and a.position_grade = #{positionGrade} and a.online = #{online} order by cast(ifnull(seq, 0) as signed integer), convert(name using gbk)

select w.id, w.name, w.type, w.nation, w.pinyin, w.gender, w.certificate_no, w.birthday, w.politics, w.tel_phone, w.mobile_phone, w.address, w.post_code, w.email, w.wx, w.qq, w.status, w.online, w.pic, w.intro, w.recommend, w.org_user_id, w.wx_cp_user_id, w.position_grade, d.id dept_id, d.name dept_name from sys_worker w, sys_dept_worker dw, sys_dept d, sys_user u where w.id = dw.worker_id and dw.dept_id = d.id and w.id = u.worker_id and d.org_id = #{orgId} and d.id in
#{deptId}
select w.*, d.name as dept_name from sys_worker w inner join sys_dept_worker dw on dw.worker_id = w.id and dw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept d on d.id = dw.dept_id where d.id = #{deptId}

select w.id, w.name, w.gender, w.positional, wdf.fee diagnose_fee, w.pic, d.id dept_id, d.name dept_name, o.id org_id, o.name org_name, d.his_dept_id, w.org_user_id his_worker_id from sys_worker w, sys_dept_worker dw, sys_dept d, sys_org o, sys_worker_diagnose_fee wdf where w.id = dw.worker_id and dw.dept_id = d.id and d.org_id = o.id and dw.status = 'a' and w.online = 'b' and o.id = wdf.org_id and w.positional = wdf.positional and o.id = #{orgId} and d.id = #{deptId} and d.dept_type = #{deptType} and w.positional = #{positional} and w.name rlike #{workerName}

select w.id, w.name, w.gender, w.positional, wdf.fee diagnose_fee, w.intro, w.pic, d.id dept_id, d.name dept_name, o.id org_id, o.name org_name, d.his_dept_id, w.org_user_id his_worker_id from sys_worker w, sys_dept_worker dw, sys_dept d, sys_org o, sys_worker_diagnose_fee wdf where w.id = dw.worker_id and dw.dept_id = d.id and d.org_id = o.id and dw.status = 'a' and w.online = 'b' and o.id = wdf.org_id and w.positional = wdf.positional and w.id = #{workerId}
